agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Culture, Recreation & Tourism TIME & DATE: 2:00 PM or upon final adjourn./recess or bill referral if permission granted Tuesday, March 26, 2019 PLACE: E1.014 CHAIR: Rep. John Cyrier HB 510 Wilson Relating to enforcement of rules for certain county and municipal parks, playgrounds, historical museums, or historic or prehistoric sites; creating a criminal offense. HB 1098 Guillen Relating to the importation of Pacific oysters for sale for consumption. HB 1896 Phelan Relating to the applicability of the requirements relating to the adoption of a new state agency rule by the Parks and Wildlife Department. HB 2298 Parker Relating to designating January 28 as Sexual Assault Survivors Day. HB 2402 Geren Relating to the eligibility of certain events to receive funding through the Major Events Reimbursement Program. HB 2496 Cyrier | et al. Relating to the designation of a property as a historic landmark by a municipality. HB 2806 Morrison Relating to the creation of the Texas music incubator rebate program to provide for rebates of a portion of the mixed beverage gross receipts taxes collected from certain music venues. HB 3054 Gervin-Hawkins Relating to designating June as Gun Violence Awareness Month. HB 3084 Cyrier Relating to designating July 20 as Space Exploration Day. HCR 77 Dominguez Designating rescue shelter cats and dogs as the official state pets of Texas. HCR 123 Klick Designating the breakfast taco as the official state breakfast item of Texas. *The order in which bills are heard is at the discretion of the chair. Public testimony may be limited to three (3) minutes per individual.* NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
